title: Stone Soup Torrenting
description:
Handy little TORRENT tips note I found in a little web-site (I forget where?)

Really handy tips on Torrenting, and how we can all improve our speed and complete many many more Torrents than we do now.

Signed by a man, but nickname appears to be a woman (Honeypot) so I\\\\\\\&#039;d be a little wary of trying to contact the email name in the text-file included.

The information inside seems to be a very good idea, and I HAVE seen massive speed improvements on my own Torrents, using the techniques suggested, and more of them complete much more often to 100%.

It\\\\\\\&#039;s just a tiny text file, and you can\\\\\\\&#039;t get harmed by it.

It could help to speed up ALL torrents though.

----------------------------------------------------------

What do I think of it?

A Great idea, let\\\\\\\&#039;s hope everyone catches on.

T.C.W. TheComputerWizard

5th April 2008 - This is the first posting by me. Soon some Music.
